title: Accusations fly after missile strike kills dozens of Ukrainian POWs
content:
1. Accusations fly after missile strike kills dozens of Ukrainian POWs  Reuters.com
  2. Russia claims 40 Ukrainian POWs killed in strike with US HIMARS, Ukraine decries 'brutal execution'  Fox News
  3. Russia, Ukraine trade blame for deadly attack on POW prison  The Associated Press
  4. "Azov" announces a hunt for everyone involved in mass murder of prisoners in Olenivka  Yahoo News
  5. Russia and Ukraine accuse each other of purported strike on prison  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ミサイル攻撃で数十人のウクライナ人捕虜が死亡し、非難の声が上がる
导弹袭击造成数十名乌克兰战俘死亡后，指责声四起
導彈襲擊造成數十名烏克蘭戰俘死亡後，指責聲四起
